meanings.definition: The state or quality of being a member or part of a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: Her belongingnesses to the book club brought her joy.
meanings.sent2: The sense of belongingnesses in the team made him feel valued.
meanings.sent3: His belongingnesses to the knitting group led to many colorful scarves.
meanings.sent4: The belongingnesses to the ocean of a sailor is like the sky to a bird.
meanings.sent5: The belongingnesses to the family was evident in their shared laughter.

meanings.definition: The feeling of being connected or accepted by others.
meanings.sent1: The belongingnesses she felt at the party made her smile.
meanings.sent2: His belongingnesses with his classmates grew stronger over time.
meanings.sent3: The cat's belongingnesses to the dog was a surprising friendship.
meanings.sent4: Her belongingnesses to the music enveloped her in comfort.
meanings.sent5: The belongingnesses in the air after a successful performance was palpable.

meanings.definition: The possession or ownership of something.
meanings.sent1: His belongingnesses of the antique vase was well-known.
meanings.sent2: The belongingnesses of the rare coin collection was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The belongingnesses of the golden key unlocked many doors.
meanings.sent4: Her belongingnesses of the magical ring granted her wishes.
meanings.sent5: The belongingnesses of the ancient map led to hidden treasures.
